DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identifies the predefined types of a task type from which the type required may be set.

DocAttribute.Name: WorkMethod
DocAttribute.Documentation: The method of work used in carrying out a task.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute ProcessType must be asserted when the value of PredefinedType is set to USERDEFINED.
